title: Trailer: Queen of the Con: The OC Savior
itunes:title: Trailer: Queen of the Con: The OC Savior
description:
Lizzie Mulder appears to be a wealthy Orange County CPA, swooping in like an angel to help small business owners manage their companies. After this clever con artist’s scams push her clients to the brink, Lizzie ends up in the crosshairs of an enterprising Laguna Beach detective and the FBI. But even that heat can’t prevent Lizzie from pulling her most brazen con yet. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
